precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Hold the wallet with your left hand.
Slowly bring the wallet to your right hand.
With your right hand, hold the zipper of the wallet.
Slowly open the zipper of the wallet while continuing to hold it with your left hand.
Retrieve a coin from inside the wallet while still holding the wallet with your left hand.
Hold the coin with your right hand.
Pick up the coin with your right hand fingers.
Place the coin on the table.
Practice picking up the coin from the table and then putting it down.
Practice picking up the coin from the table and then putting it down, ensuring to bend your elbow during the process.
Practice the action of putting the coin back in the wallet, using this as a gripping exercise with your fingers.
